ygData.subject: Re: Galtin's misadventure + some questions about corpse s in  the ocean
ygData.msgSnippet: If I am on, I can try helping you with Aquatic Ayre... But I m sure a Guide or GM would help you under those circumstances. G luck ... From: Reece, Tom CPT -
ygData.messageBody:
If I am on, I can try helping you with Aquatic Ayre... But I'm sure a Guide
or GM would help you under those circumstances.
G'luck

-----Original Message-----
From: Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn <ReeceT@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 07, 1999 5:54 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Galtin's misadventure + some questions about corpse s
in the ocean


>From: "Reece, Tom CPT - 30th Signal Bn" <ReeceT@...>
>
>
>> > 3) Why did the locate song not lead me to the other player's corpse?
>>
>> In my experience if you target a player with no corpse in the zone, you
>> get the same message saying that you sense a corpse in this direction,
>> but it does not actually turn you in any direction. Maybe you were
>> already pointing in that direction, and just though it was pulling you?
>>
> In this particular case, I was facing inward on the dock when I
>started the song. I definately got turned around when I got the "You sense
>a corpse" message.
>
>
> Galtin
> E'ci
